text: The Women's Professional Billiard Association Tour (known as the WPBA Tour) is a recurring series of professional ladies' pool tournaments first held in 1992. Events on the Tour are played under the 9-Ball rules. Events in the Tour feature the women's U.S. Open Nine-ball Championship, the WPBA Masters, and the WPBA Tour Championship. The series runs a world ranking format, based on the results of the prior 6 events. The events are run by the Women's Professional Billiard Association (WPBA). The Tour followed the WPBA receding from the Professional Billiard Tour Association (PBTA) the year prior. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Pool tours and series Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1992
title: WPBA Tour
